collaborativeSourcing.tag: SAP Collaborative Sourcing and Contract Management Solutions

keyFeatures.title: Automated Contract Creation
keyFeatures.description: Automates the contract creation cycle, from draft to reviews and approvals.

keyFeatures.title: Contract Authoring Tools
keyFeatures.description: Includes clause libraries and conditional templates for seamless contract creation.

keyFeatures.title: Centralized Contract Repository
keyFeatures.description: Creates a contract repository with access-controlled search and reporting.

keyFeatures.title: Audit Trail & Compliance
keyFeatures.description: Maintains an audit trail for internal, external, and regulatory requirements.

keyFeatures.title: Integrated Source-to-Contract Process
keyFeatures.description: Provides deep, bidirectional integration within the source-to-contract process.

keyFeatures.title: Expiry & Renewal Management
keyFeatures.description: Includes expiry notifications for improved contract renewal management.

keyFeatures.title: Task-Driven Notifications
keyFeatures.description: Centralized electronic task-driven notification alerts for contract management.

keyFeatures.title: On-Demand Deployment
keyFeatures.description: Enables rapid time to value with on-demand deployment for flexibility.

keyFeatures.title: Microsoft Word Integration
keyFeatures.description: Supports Microsoft Word integration for streamlined contract editing.

keyFeatures.title: eSignature Integration
keyFeatures.description: Integrates with leading eSignature providers like DocuSign and Adobe EchoSign.
